titles.title: Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth,
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth,
There is no way you can hold me back,
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This resurrection, sown in corruption.
Raised incorruptible, sown in dishonour,
Raised in glory, sown in weakness,
Raised in power, His new life in me.
